channel.title: Blogs on Eklavya 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Eklavya 2021

item.description: Haar Features! What are features in Computer Vision? Features are identification marks of an image using which we can convinicingly identify different images. Most features record data related to extreme change in pixel intensities(edges). These features can also be categorized for specific objects such as a Face, Hands, Person, etc. What are Haar Features? There are many different types of features which differ from one another on the basis of method used for calculating them.
